name: Scrolling Overlays
author: Cassidy Mcdonald & Jack Considine

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to insert “Scrolling Overlays” into your posts and pages. Overlays appear over the entire page
when the corresponding position is in the viewport.

Credits

  • Designed by Cassidy McDonald

Scrolling overlays WordPress Plugin, Copyright 2019 K-Optional Software, LLC
Scrolling overlays is distributed under the terms of the GNU GPL
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Done ðŸ™‚
sections.faq:
Do the overlays appear in post previews?

Yes.
